DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about dark figures
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was wandering around the colony when I saw a shadowy figure coming out of a dark corner. I asked it what it wants, but it didn't respond. The figure approached me, coming closer and closer with each second. I panicked, the fear paralysed me. Then another figure appeared behind me. After that, the figures grabbed me by my legs and arms. I screamed and everything went dark.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about moon crash
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I awoke in my room. Felt a bit thirsty so I went to the kitchen to drink some water. Went outside to get some fresh air and there was an enormous moon up in the sky. Everything was shaking, almost like an earthquake was terrorizing the area. Orange light illuminated the surroundings. Buildings were floating here and there, like gravity had been turned off. The Moon came closer. The shaking got stronger. I heard screaming. Then some odd force hit me and I collapsed.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about tragic lives and deaths
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I had to enter 7 tragical lives of people who had 7 tragical deaths. I lived 7 tragic lives and died 7 tragic deaths. 7... 7... 7...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about Armageddon
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I dreamt that the whole world fell apart. It was a disaster.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about pile of corpses
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was lying on a huge pile of human corpses , some rotten, some fresh. I couldn't move. It was some kind of cargo section inside of a ship in the ocean. From the pile crawled a rotten corpse and grabbed my feet and bit off some toes. It crawled closer and tried to bite... well... that place... I woke up with pain in that place...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about brain in a jar
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was in the middle of some kind of secret archotech laboratory. All surfaces were sterile and perfectly clean. I explored the place for a while until I reached a warehouse which looked like it was hundreds of miles long. On every shelf there was a jar with a brain, connected to a screen. I watched what was happening on those screens... Someone was cooking a meal... Someone else was chased by gangsters... Another person got some lovin'... but then I saw a truly extraordinary screen. It showed the perspective of a man in a huge warehouse filled with jars with brains...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about meat locker
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was exploring the colony in the dark when I stumbled into the freezer. I saw shapes in the heavy mist hanging on meat hooks, and when I drew close I saw that they were human. They reached for me and I tried to turn away but there were more behind me, possessing the faces of people we have killed. They grabbed me and lifted me onto a hook to stay there with them for all eternity...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about tiki-spider
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was in a humid, foreign jungle, trapped in a long, ancient stone temple hallway. I turned around, and a spider with a tiki mask started chasing me. I woke up just before it pounced...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about escaping a maze
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was running on what looked like hard packed dirt with little bits of gravel and grass. As I ran I would often times have to make decisions on where to run, left or right, because the walls that blocked the way were clown and doll heads. I had to run a maze that was made out of a clown and doll head, while something chased me. I woke up and was in a dry sweat and didn't want to open my eyes at all.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about fight among friends
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Me and my best friend met in front of their house. We wanted to go biking together, and so we did. We were biking around many different places. When we were finally coming back home we saw a bunch of alligators climbing on a fence next to us. Scared, we rode away as fast as we could. After some time it got really cold outside, so we stopped under someone's house so we could dress up into heavier clothes. Suddenly, out of nowhere, a tank appeared and shot at us. My friend escaped with their bike, leaving me alone. Sometime later I woke up at a house. It was the same house we stopped at to dress up. An old man was the owner and he was actually nice. My phone's battery was completely dead though. I wanted to go back home with my bike, but it was in pieces and some were missing. I walked home to tell my parents what happened. When I came back for my bike my other friends were taking it apart for parts. I had to fight them for my bike.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about unfortunate marriage
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was in a small church, getting married. My family was sitting on one side of the room, and the other side was where my fiance's family was. The pastor was giving the ceremony, and we were holding hands, looking at each other. At one point, I slowly looked over to both our families. Nothing seemed out of the ordinary. Everything was fine. My family was sitting in the pews, as normal, my fiance's as well. After looking at them, I looked at my fiance. A few seconds later, I looked back at the families, and noticed something odd. My fiance's family had changed into a random menagerie of canines. My family was completely unphased. I look back at my fiance which had turned into a greyish black werewolf, smirking, still holding my hands.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about abandoned maze
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I wandered around a labyrinth of rooms and hallways made up of my childhood home and locations I had previously visited, like my school and my friend's and family's houses. Everything was in black and white, and I had the feeling of being followed, or even chased at times. The rooms always looked run down, like they had been abandoned...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about a little dwarf
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I dreamt I walked around the forest with my friend and a little dwarf ambushed us and stabbed them with a tiny knife!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about destruction of colony
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was walking away from the colony. I felt a strong sense of urgency, that I needed to get away, yet I couldn't figure out why. As I walked up to the hill overlooking the colony , I started to calm. As I reached the top, I sat down upon the grass under the trees and watched calmly as a small figure fell down from the boundless, blue sky. Only then, as the antigrain warhead went off did I understand why I had felt that urgency.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about destruction of tribe
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was walking away from the camping grounds. I felt a strong sense of urgency, that I needed to get away, yet I couldn't figure out why. As I walked up to the hill overlooking the tribe, I started to calm. As I reached the top, I sat down upon the grass under the trees and watched calmly as a small figure fell down from the boundless, blue sky. Only then, as the gigantic blood machine went approached did I understand why I had felt that urgency.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about killing my favourite animal
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I had to kill my pet by strangling it, I was squeezing its throat with both hands and it wouldn't die and just kept looking at me with its big soft eyes. I was sobbing uncontrollably in the dream but I had to just keep trying to kill it.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about distant danger
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I had a dream in which I walked around the colony. After a few moments I realised that my head was rolling down the hill away from our home. I chased it until it stopped. After finally regaining my precious head, I looked around. Everything was burned to the ground and the only sounds were coming from strange machinery spitting out ancient mechanoids...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about distant danger
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I had a dream in which I walked around the village. After a few moments I realised that my head was rolling down the hill away from our home. I chased it until it stopped. After finally regaining my precious head, I looked around. Everything was burned to the ground and the only sounds were coming from strange machinery spitting out blood machines...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about killing a close one
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I killed a person close to me in my dream. I didn't want to!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about eating humans
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was forced to eat someone in my dream. It was an awful experience...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about fighting zombies
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Our group had to defend against zombies using some ancient non-lethal weaponry. Why would you even use non-lethal weapons?!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about bandit cowboy
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: A cowboy called us on the radio. The entire colony gathered to chat with him. Half were charmed by his outlandish tales, half felt he was sketchy. He wanted to join us, along with his giant boomalope. After a long discussion, he was refused, but he still insisted on passing through the colony. He led the boomalope through our fields and when he was in the middle of our crops, near the windmills... he released the 'lope and ran like hell. Then came the bandits. He was part of the bandits... and the boomalope exploding was the sign for the attack.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about stealing honey
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was in some kind of magical forest. After walking a few miles I noticed a big bee hive. I was hungry, so I put my hand in it to snatch some honey but when I took it out there was no honey... only wiggling maggots.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about surgery
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Please, no! Don't take my organs...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about punishment
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: They beat me and starved me. Whatever I did, however I tried to please my captors, I only got pain in reward. The crack of the whip woke me up.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about being chased
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Something was chasing me but I couldn't run!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about event from the past
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I had a dream about a stressful event from my past. I would rather not be reminded of it.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about being devoured by snake
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was slowly being devoured by a gigantic snake!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about killing
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I killed without mercy... But I didn't want to...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about starvation
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was starving... I begged people to help me... But they wouldn't!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about being in prison
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I asked them to let me out... I was innocent...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about childhood
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I relived some of the worst moments from my childhood.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about insects
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: They were crawling everywhere. Millions of bugs and worms were chasing me. At least I woke up the moment they got me...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about injury
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I had wounds all over my body. Someone hurt me pretty badly but I managed to escape.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about social exclusion
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was excluded from my group because I was scared to snort Yayo... Do we even have any Yayo?

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about zombie trucks
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was chased across an arid shrubland by zombified monster trucks that had emerged from a cave in a mountain...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about being executed
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: My head rolled on the ground for a long time after being swiftly disconnected from my body... I couldn't catch my breath... This guilt is killing me!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about kittens
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: There was a litter of kittens spread throughout our home. I knew I was dreaming, but I also knew I had to collect all the kittens before something bad happened. Somehow, I could not just wake up. I tried to gather the kittens, but dropped them or lost them whenever I thought I was done. I ran through the rooms, desperate and scared, but couldn't find all of them.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about girl on desert planet
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: The planet was being ravaged by outsiders, its resources stolen and people enslaved. She stood among sparkling gusts of sand and reached out for me to help defend her home. But I did not know her, or the world she was from. And in the end, we both were were swallowed by the sand, reddened by the blood of her people...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about tornado
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I had a dream where I was in a brick building and it got hit by a tornado. It pulled the building apart and picked me up into the air! Somehow, I did not get hurt.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Can't recall a bad dream
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I dreamt about something upsetting but I don't really remember what it was...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about silly things
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Dancing nuns, walking sofas, talking plants... I dreamt about weird things, nothing in particular but it didn't feel good.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about my ex partner
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I don't want you back in my life! Stop bothering me in my sleep!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about being nude
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was walking around our colony, when I realised that I'm wearing no clothes! I felt so embarrassed when everyone started laughing at me!

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about flamingos invasion
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: The world got invaded by pink birds. The birds had kevlar helmets, assault rifles, demonic red eyes, and they were sometimes doing drill movements.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about flamingos invasion
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: The world got invaded by pink birds. The birds had inpenetrable by our weapons armour. They were practicing odd war tactics.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about being mind controlled
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: People around me were getting injected with mind control drugs forcefully.
